alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:16PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Plumas, northeastern Tehama, southeastern Shasta and Lassen Counties through 300 PM PDT... At 215 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mineral, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mineral, Chester, Manzanita Lake, Viola and Lassen National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
